mastermind package¶

Jeu du Mastermind

mastermind.game module¶

The class Mastermind

class mastermind.game.Mastermind¶

This class is the Mastermind class. Pegs and board definitions.

Initialitation. Generate a 4-list with random colors.

entry()¶

Takes the user input

Returns:

entries(list): user chosen colors

comparaison(seq)¶

Comparation between the computer sequence i.e the answer to find and the user sequence.

Args:

seq(list): User choice

Returns:
sol(list): 4-colors list:

black: if the user find a color in the right place white: if the user find a color but not in the right place ‘.’: if the color chosen by the user is not in the computer sequence.

fill_board(new, matrix_response)¶

Add the turn in the board and print it

evolve(win)¶

Function that keep the game runing until you win

Args:

win (bool): True if you have everything right

Returns:

win (bool): True if you have everything right
